name: The Way of the Soul
description:
Project

This is the First level of a  Platformer made during my first year of Game Design studies for ETPA Montpellier, France.

Synopsis

Lumel, a young human who has the power to separate his soul from his body, can travel in places where no one could normally go to. He wishes to find a new shelter for the Human kind while the Earth is dying. A potential new realm stands at his reach. But is it really good trying to save a humanity which is the source of the destruction of its own planet ?

Is a new start relevant if it is to make the same mistakes again?

Controls

Left/Right arrows : moving towards left /right

Arrow Up :  Jumping

A : Dashing

A + maintaining Arrow Up : Diagonal Dash

Z :  Teleporting if you are in the right area

To restart the game

To restart the game,  simply press F5 to refresh the page.
